message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $110, which is still a great deal considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $95, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $105, which is getting close to my minimum. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. Can you meet me at $100?

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $102, which is my absolute limit. If you're willing to meet me here, I'll consider it a done deal.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit short. I'll meet you at $99, that's my final offer

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob! I'm not willing to go below my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $101, which is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me here, I'll consider it a done deal.
I've made a serious offer at $99, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150
